name: Mixed Bag 8 Quiz | Mixed 10 Q. Difficult [E] | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which Hitchcock movie did Leo G. Carroll not appear in?
Name China's largest city, by population.
questions.explanation:
Shanghai.

	China is the world's third largest country behind Russia and Canada. Bejing is the capital.

questions.text: What was the first year you could buy a stereo LP?
Where was the site of the final battle of the 'War of the Roses'?
questions.explanation:
Bosworth.

	It was in 1485 between King Richard III and Henry Tudor who later became Henry VII.

questions.text: How many of the United States border on the ocean or Gulf of Mexico?
The superman Museum is located in Metropolis, Illinois? (True or False)

questions.explanation:
Tree.

	It is a tree found in Malaysia. (The Malayan custard apple.)

questions.text: In 'Crayola' crayons what is the black crayon designed to smell like?
In the comic strip 'The Gumps' what is the name of the son?
In what month, during World War 2, did Germany surrender?
questions.explanation:
May.

	May 7, 1945. Hitler committed suicide on April 30,1945, seven days before the surrender.
